Linux FreePascal port of MTDORB by Artyom Smirnov <artyom.smirnov@red-soft.biz> for Red Soft Corporation (http://www.red-soft.biz/).

Requires:
    fpc >= 2.2.0 (http://www.freepascal.org/)
    make (http://www.gnu.org/software/make)

Run make in the root of MTDORB project, for building libmtdorb.so and idltopas.

See simple FreePascal/Delphi demo (demo/hello_world) to learn using MTDORB in FreePascal.

Feel free to contact me about bugs, issues and suggestions.
